query: I need your assistance in creating a week-long travel itinerary for a group of 5. We will be departing from Appleton and plan on visiting 3 different cities in Illinois between March 2nd and March 8th, 2022. We have a budget of $12,100, prefer to have entire rooms, won't be taking any flights and we should have the option to have visitors at our accommodations.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Moline,Belleville,Chicago]

move:seg1:self-driving:Moline->Belleville 417km cost 417
move:seg2:self-driving:Belleville->Chicago 474km cost 474
move:seg3:self-driving:Chicago->Appleton 314km cost 314
